snippet: A car bomber detonated his explosives outside a church in Jos, and gunmen attacked another church in Biu.
abstract: Car filled with explosives detonates outside a church in Jos, Nigeria, and gunmen attack another church in Biu, killing at least four people and wounding dozens; attacks bear the hallmarks of assaults on Christians by radical Islamist sect Boko Haram, which continue unabated despite a heavy military presence in the region.
lead_paragraph: A car bomber detonated his explosives outside a church in Jos, and gunmen attacked another church in Biu.

headline.seo: Jos and Biu Attacks in Nigeria Target Christians
